div.p: ANTONIO: So, we've covered psychological influences. The other major influence on our choices is social factors. And that's a broad category.
ANTONIO: It includes anything that happens in any group we are part of—our family, our friends, the people we work with, the neighborhood we live in, even our nation.
ANTONIO: Think about all of the aspects of your life that involve other people. How do they affect you?

ANTONIO: Think about any other aspects of your social life—cultural customs, work activities, things you do for fun, or things you do out of obligation. What social influences do you see in the world around you?
